interface.name: zway_cooler_mousegrabber
interface.description:
This interface allows clients to manipulate the compositor's cursor position on the screen.
The intended use case of this is to re-implement AwesomeWM's original "keygrabber" Lua interface.

request.name: grab_mouse
request.description:
Attempts to grab the mouse from the compositor.
Only one client can grab the mouse at a time. Attempts to grab while another client is already grabbing is a protocol error.

request.name: release_mouse
request.description:
Relinquishes control of the mouse back to the compositor.
It is a protocol error to call this when the client has not grabbed the mouse.

entry.name: already_grabbed
entry.summary: the mouse has already been grabbed by another client

entry.name: not_grabbed
entry.summary: A client attempted to release the mouse when it was not acquired

description.summary: notify the client that the mouse has moved
notify the client that a mouse button was pressed
